comments.author: igor@mir2.org
comments.body:
Created attachment 156662
toSource implementation

The patch assumes that toXMLString always produces valid JS XML literal. 

The patch also adds the indent argument to toXMLString to be implemented
properly later.

comments.author: igor@mir2.org
comments.body:
Created attachment 156670
Extending the previous patch to QName and Namespace

description: It would be nice if XML objects would provide reasonable toSource implementation
